name: BALEARIC HELICOPTERS, S.L.
about: Balearic Helicopters, S.L. is an authorized AESA centre and Approved Training Organisation (ESP.ATO.320) under EASA regulations. Located on the island of Mallorca, next to the Mediterranean Sea, we offer top-quality helicopter flight training in a sunny and ideal flying environment. Our professional instructors provide comprehensive training for various licenses, including Private Pilot Licence (PPL) and Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), as well as type rating courses and other specialized training programs. With a focus on safety, professionalism, and technique, Balearic Helicopters is committed to delivering exceptional flight training experiences. Our location ensures over 300 days of sunshine each year, making it an ideal place for aviation training. We are dedicated to helping aspiring pilots achieve their aviation goals in a supportive and scenic setting.
